column4: yo i need to send a fax, but i keep getting told 'efax: 07:31 Error: can't open serial port /dev/modem: No such file or directory
someone help me set up my box to fax?
!fax
nothing huh?
but it's telling me to use a serial port
i don't have any serial ports
can someone help me send a freaking fax?
hey ubuntu, i need to send a fax.   HELP
Is your dial-up modem working?
Perhaps it would be more help ful if you posted the model etc
Why would the howto say anything about installing hardware .... Ubuntu support including this channel is for software help
Post the output of "lspci" on http://paste.ubuntu.com
Post the output of "lspci" on http://paste.ubuntu.com
USB, PCI ...
Post output for lspci
What laptop model is this
You can confirm that this modem device has been used in the past?
yes
several times
on windows though
type dmesg and search for any failure reports
Hmm sorry can't think of anything ... you have to file a bug report
